about.aboutContent: CloudTray was created to solve a common problem: the need to share files quickly and effortlessly. With direct integration to Google Drive, CloudTray allows you to upload and share files in just a few clicks, making your daily tasks faster and more productive.
about.aboutContent2: The project was based on the
about.aboutContent2.2: developed by Diego in the Rocketseat channel, just changing some aspects to make integration simpler and easier for any user to configure.
about.aboutContent3: The CloudTray is an open source project, you can contribute to the project on
